poi_cafe_entrance.name: KitaHack Cafe Entrance
poi_cafe_entrance.description: The main entrance to KitaHack Cafe. There's a slight ramp leading up to double automatic sliding doors. The cafe is known for its excellent coffee and accessible seating.
poi_cafe_entrance.safetyNotes: Watch out for delivery bikes in the morning. Pavement can be uneven directly outside the door.

poi_mrt_station.name: KLCC MRT Station - Exit A
poi_mrt_station.description: Main accessible exit from KLCC MRT station. Features wide gates and direct elevator access to street level. Connects to Suria KLCC shopping mall.
poi_mrt_station.safetyNotes: Can be crowded during rush hours (7-9am, 5-7pm). Elevators are on the north side of the platform.

poi_hospital_entrance.name: KL General Hospital - Main Entrance
poi_hospital_entrance.description: Main entrance to KL General Hospital with dedicated accessible drop-off zone. Porters available to assist. Registration counter is 20 meters from entrance on the right.
poi_hospital_entrance.safetyNotes: Ambulance bay is separate - do not wait in that zone. Wheelchair lending available at information counter.

poi_accessible_restroom.name: Suria KLCC - Accessible Restroom (Level G)
poi_accessible_restroom.description: Fully accessible restroom located near the food court on Ground Floor. Features grab bars, emergency pull cord, and spacious interior.
poi_accessible_restroom.safetyNotes: Key available from security desk if door is locked. Located between Food Republic and Cold Storage.

poi_pedestrian_crossing.name: Jalan Ampang Accessible Crossing
poi_pedestrian_crossing.description: Signal-controlled pedestrian crossing with audio signals for visually impaired users. Extra crossing time available by holding the button.
poi_pedestrian_crossing.safetyNotes: Traffic can be heavy. Listen for the audio signal before crossing. Extended crossing time: hold button for 3 seconds.
